title: The Trojan Horse Affair - Part 8
description: A man banned from working in education in the aftermath of the Trojan Horse letter inspires Brian and Hamza to track down one last witness with him – in Australia. And all three travelers find their faith tested.
author: rich@thislife.org (Serial Productions & The New York Times)
